name: Southwestern Pasta Salad (vegan)
description: This Southwestern Pasta salad with avocado, black beans, and lime dressing is one of my new favorites. It's not only super easy to make, but also healthy. It's a great addition to any BBQs and potlucks!
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cherry tomatoes, cut into halves
1  orange bell pepper, cut into stripes

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Once cooked, rinse with cold water and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Once cooked, rinse with cold water and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients for the dressing. Add the ingredients for the pasta salad and stir well. Let the salad sit in the fridge for a couple of hours. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients for the dressing. Add the ingredients for the pasta salad and stir well. Let the salad sit in the fridge for a couple of hours. Enjoy!
